attributes.action:
defend the human rights of donor-conceived people by ensuring the truth is
entered on their birth certificates
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We the undersigned, a group of donor-conceived people, parents of donor-conceived people, professionals in the field, and other concerned parties petition the Prime Minister to defend the human rights of donor-conceived people by ensuring that the truth about their biological parents is recorded on their birth certificates -- a consideration that is taken for granted by every other person born in this country.
